descriptionHtml:
hi，it is my first mod in nexus
I do not quite understand about this site and I do not use English
I translated it by google.
sorry.
=====================================================================================
[font=Impact][size=3][color=#2f4f4f]To an enemy and not hesitate to use Arcane

One was a vampire Battle Mage [/color][/size][/font]
[img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/75cd95f34c71da8e6ed6ca46b4d84422/tumblr_ov1fhnsHui1w2o6hfo1_1280.jpg[/img]
==============================================================================
[color=Red][size=4]He can use Lightning Bolt, Sparks, Firebolt, Fire Storm, Healing, and Oakflesh.
However, the most commonly used Sparks
AND HE can use the Dragon Flame Breath[/size]

[size=5]IN Dragonsreach ,you can find he[/size][/color]
==============================================================================
Requirement：Dawnguard
==============================================================================
Credits and Thanks
Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
==============================================================================
